metadata.Title: CVE-2023-51384 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.Description: In ssh-agent in OpenSSH before 9.6, certain destination constraints can beincompletely applied. When destination constraints are specified duringaddition of PKCS#11-hosted private keys, these constraints are only appliedto the first key, even if a PKCS#11 token returns multiple keys.

criterions.comment: openssh package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
openssh-ssh1 package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
